mapper.select: SELECT vs.d_day, vs.vacc_sche_idx,vs.vac_idx,v.vacc_name , p.pet_name FROM pet p,vaccin_scheduler vs,pet_vaccin pv,vaccin v WHERE p.pet_idx=pv.pet_idx AND vs.vac_idx=pv.vac_idx AND v.vacc_idx=pv.vacc_idx AND vs.d_day >= #{param1} AND vs.d_day < #{param2} AND vs.id =#{param3} ORDER BY vs.vacc_sche_idx DESC
